data.title: Henry Fonda (Actor)
data.meta_description: Profile of actor Henry Fonda with biographical facts, historical events and Henry Fonda's married life.
data.text:
Henry Fonda

Profession: Actor

Biography: The Grapes of Wrath, 12 Angry Men and On Golden Pond.

Born: May 16, 1905

Birthplace: Grand Island, Nebraska, USA

Generation: Greatest Generation

Chinese Zodiac: Snake

Star Sign: Taurus

Died: August 12, 1982 (aged 77)

Cause of Death: Heart disease

Married Life

American actor Henry Fonda (31) weds Canadian-American socialite Frances Ford Seymour (28) at Christ Church, New York City, until her death in1950

American actor Henry Fonda (45) weds socialite and third wife Susan Blanchard (22) in New York City; divorce in 1956

Historical Events

"Jezebel" film premieres directed by William Wyler, starring Bette Davis and Henry Fonda, from the play by Owen Davis

"The Grapes of Wrath", directed by John Ford and based on John Steinbeck's novel of the same name, starring Henry Fonda and Jane Darwell, is released

2nd Tony Awards: "Mister Roberts" (Play); Henry Fonda (Actor) and Joshua Logan (Director) win

Herman Wouk's stage drama "The Caine Mutiny Court-Martial", adpated from his novel "The Caine Mutiny", starring Henry Fonda, and directed by Charles Laughton, premieres at the Plymouth Theatre, NYC; runs for 415 performances

"12 Angry Men", directed by Sidney Lumet, starring Henry Fonda and Lee J. Cobb, is released

39th Golden Globes: On Golden Pond, Henry Fonda & Meryl Streep win

54th Academy Awards: "Chariots of Fire", Henry Fonda & Katharine Hepburn win

Famous Actors

Desi Arnaz

Jack Klugman

James Corden

Jean-Paul Belmondo

Michael J. Fox

Sam Worthington
